data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":null,"id":437544,"title":"People","original_title":"People","overview":"Six vignettes pit an assortment of characters against each other in everyday situations.","poster_path":"/tXKAlTxGsiMkmomgXouIUU26gmt.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[],"popularity":3.439,"release_date":"2016-04-22","video":false,"vote_average":6.6,"vote_count":8},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":923226,"title":"People","original_title":"People","overview":"People is a film shot behind closed doors in a workshop/house on the outskirts of Paris and features a dozen characters. It is based on an interweaving of scenes of moaning and sex. The house is the characters' common space, but the question of ownership is distended, they don't all inhabit it in the same way. As the sequences progress, we don't find the same characters but the same interdependent relationships. Through the alternation between lament and sexuality, physical and verbal communication are put on the same level. The film then deconstructs, through its repetitive structure, our relational myths.","poster_path":"/u6d3bVEVqT949RW9x9zuaapWxkW.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":2.251,"release_date":"2021-06-21","video":false,"vote_average":7.8,"vote_count":6},{"backdrop_path":"/8l0sSbZ4Kt2a7s0wQf0hXwXwW9a.jpg","id":996525,"title":"Gangnam Zombie","original_title":"강남좀비","overview":"Citizens from upscale Gangnam in Seoul start experiencing unusual and terrifying symptoms, devolving into inhuman creatures, leaving only a few survivors with the possibility to make it out alive.","poster_path":"/m7H2JvD18pxQr21ImBbv2vyy6kK.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ko","genre_ids":[27,18,28],"popularity":17.331,"release_date":"2023-01-05","video":true,"vote_average":4.575,"vote_count":40},{"backdrop_path":"/rePwHcfSRaq2tZzrn4haWcPsYm6.jpg","id":65573,"title":"In the Name of the Italian People","original_title":"In nome del popolo italiano","overview":"An obscure Italian magistrate suspects that a well-known industrialist commited murder, and decides to investigate him, and bring him to court, whatever it takes.
